vS.Description: objective value of the smaller-sooner option

vL.Description: objective value of the larger-later option

dS.Description: time delay in days of the smaller-sooner option

dL.Description: time delay in days of the larger-later option

dDiff.Description: absolute difference between smaller-sooner and larger-later time delays in days

choice.Description: choice of smaller-sooner or larger-later option

SV_SS.Description: subjective value of the smaller-sooner option

SV_LL.Description: subjective value of the larger-later option

SV_sum.Description: sum of the subjective value of the smaller-sooner and larger later options

SV_diff.Description: absolute difference between subjective value of the smaller-sooner and larger-later options

SV_chosen.Description: subjective value of the chosen option

SV_unchosen.Description: subjective value of the unchosen option

SV_chosen_minus_unchosen_abs.Description: absolute difference between subjective value of the chosen and unchosen options
